courtInstructions: File your response at the Housing Court in [county] County. In New York, you typically have 5-10 days to answer after being served with a petition, depending on how you were served. In NYC Housing Court, tenants are entitled to free legal representation. File an Answer form and request a trial. Consider requesting discovery for rent records and building violations. You may also request a jury trial in some cases.
